subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Vince Carter made a buzzer-beating 3-pointer to send the game into overtime and Jason Kidd recorded his 77th career triple-double to lead the Nets over the Washington Wizards.
snippet: Vince Carter made a buzzer-beating 3-pointer to send the game into overtime and Jason Kidd recorded his 77th career triple-double to lead the Nets over the Washington Wizards.
